title: I don't think I know how to play?
body:
Alright, so I am pretty new to the game, but I thought I at least knew how to join a game. Apparently not.
When I click on the play button, it takes me to the game board "pvp"etc, but that's not the issue.
Once I'm there, where there would usually be a joining button or something, but now it just has information about the games, and the home button at the bottom. The only games I seem to be able to play are custom games as opposed to pvp and co-op games.
Maybe I'm an idiot and don't know what I'm doing. Call me out on it, please. 
Anyways, this happened after I left/surrendered in a training battle against bots due to connection issues. I thought the leavebuster only applied in ranked and qued games, not training battles, and I didn't get any emails about suspension or ban.
So if you guys could maybe help me, it would be appreciated. 
Sorry.

replies.body:
I'm not seeing any Leaverbuster penalties on your account so that doesn't seem to be a problem.

Can you show a screenshot of what your client looks like? Could be a case of assets failing to load properly, but that's usually fixed by restarting the client (or sometimes even by clicking "Home" then trying to create a game again).
Ok thank you, I figured it out.

It's been over a year since I was a "new" player (I'm still learning how to die less lol) but I remember there being level restrictions for a lot of game modes. Unfortunately I can't recall what levels you unlock everything at but this may be a contributing factor to your situation. If you are already level 30 and having this experience, I'm not sure what could be affecting your ability to play certain game modes.
Leaverbuster does apply to any queue, but it's something visible that takes your whole screen with a pop-up, this is a random bug
